sn48.36:2.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kayikam sukham, kayikam satam, kayasamphassajam sukham satam vedayitam—
sn48.36:3.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kayikam dukkham, kayikam asatam, kayasamphassajam dukkham asatam vedayitam—
sn48.36:4.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, cetasikam sukham, cetasikam satam, manosamphassajam sukham satam vedayitam—
sn48.36:5.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, cetasikam dukkham, cetasikam asatam, manosamphassajam dukkham asatam vedayitam—
sn48.36:6.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kayikam va cetasikam va nevasatam nasatam vedayitam—
